title: Cover Letter Plugin Configuration Schema
description: Schema for the cover-letter oshea plugin's configuration, ensuring it adheres to the v1 plugin contract.

plugin_name.description: The name of the plugin, matching its directory name.

protocol.description: The version of the plugin contract this plugin adheres to (e.g., 'v1').

version.description: The version of the plugin itself (e.g., '1.0.0').

description.description: A brief description of the plugin's functionality.

css_files.description: List of CSS files to include with this plugin.
